text: The 1990 Big Eight Men's Basketball Tournament was held March 9–11 at Kemper Arena in Kansas City, Missouri. Top-seeded Oklahoma defeated #8 seed in the championship game, 92–80, to earn the conference's automatic bid to the 1990 NCAA Tournament. ==Bracket== ==References== Tournament Category:Big Eight Conference Men's Basketball Tournament Big Eight Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
title: 1990 Big Eight Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
